title: HR Minister Pirzada meets prime minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 20 (APP): Minister for Human Rights Mian Riaz Hussain Pirzada on Thursday called on Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif here.
During the meeting, they discussed the matters pertaining to human rights and the overall situation in the country.
Interior Minister Rana Sanaullah and Special Assistant to PM Ataullah Tarar also attended the meeting.
